comments:
The UML 1.4 Diagram Interchange meta-model uses MOF StructureType elements to
describe elements like "Point", "Dimension", etc. When running a transformation
that copies such elements in debug mode, I get (ERROR: null). On the command
line, the following is shown (everything above the "ERROR" line is 'normal'):

Strange !!! This method is not good: public static
org.mda.asm.nativeimpl.ASMOclParametrizedType
org.mda.asm.nativeimpl.ASMOclParametrizedType.getASMOclParametrizedType(java.lang.String,org.mda.asm.nativeimpl.ASMOclType,org.mda.asm.nativeimpl.ASMOclType)
Parameter: 1
        =>WriteTo
Parameter: 2
        =>debug
Trying to connect to remote debuggee
Initializing MDR...

not found. Using bytecode generation to create it.

I've used the DIModelCopy.atl transformation on the BreakoutModel.xmi model with
the M2_DiagramInterchangeModel.xmi meta-model for my test. All can be found here:

http://ssel.vub.ac.be/viewcvs/viewcvs.py/svn-gen/UML1CaseStudies/?rev=886#dirlist

-- or --

svn co -r 886 http://ssel.vub.ac.be/svn-gen/UML1CaseStudies
